desc: Woman owned small business; Renaissance Fair style hand crafted silver jewelry. Custom jewelry made to order. Jewelry made with Solid 925 Sterling Silver or 14k Gold. 92.5% Silver 7.5% Copper. No silver plating and no nickel. All rings sized to fit up to size 24! Your choice of stone and setting!

layout.text: Find the right piece for the right person that you love. All our pieces are solid Sterling Silver and hand crafted just for you. Plus, each piece carries just a bit of that Ren Faire magic.
